meanings.definition: A sweet crystalline substance obtained from various plants, especially sugar cane and sugar beet.
meanings.sent1: I added a spoonful of sugan to my tea.
meanings.sent2: The sugan made the cookies taste delicious.
meanings.sent3: The sugan spilled all over the kitchen counter!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as sugan.
meanings.sent5: The sugan sparkled like tiny crystals in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment or affectionate nickname.
meanings.sent1: Grandma always calls me her little sugan.
meanings.sent2: He whispered, 'Goodnight, sugan' before tucking her in.
meanings.sent4: She was the sugan of the family, always bringing joy.
meanings.sent5: The sugan's eyes lit up with happiness.

meanings.definition: To coat or sprinkle with sugar.
meanings.sent1: She likes to sugan her pancakes with maple syrup.
meanings.sent2: The baker will sugan the donuts before serving.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally suganed salt instead of sugar on his cereal!
meanings.sent4: The snow suganed the trees, creating a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The chef carefully suganed the dessert for a perfect finish.
